All new changes must be compatible with this scripts preset system, randomisation system (add additional settings to the options if necessary) and script modes (see options), and work in Stereo/Surround mode.Add new interface elements to logical groups with appropriate labels and maintaining the interface style. **CRITICAL: All identical UI element labels (buttons, checkboxes, input fields) MUST have unique IDs using ## notation. Example: Checkbox(ctx, "Link A##opt_link_a") vs Checkbox(ctx, "Link A##write_link_a"). Use index parameters (idx, i, binding_id) in IDs when iterating. This prevents ReaImGui state collisions. Use r.ImGui_PushID()/PopID() for list elements.** Please use Ukrainian in the chat. **IMPORTANT: Always use MCP tools when available - use mcp_reaperdev_search_functions and mcp_reaperdev_get_function_info to find reaper API documentation before implementing reaper.* functions.
